purpose: The email announces a recruitment for an Associate Professor position at TU Braunschweig, specifically in the area of Software Engineering for Safety Critical Systems. It outlines the qualifications sought, including expertise in system design and analysis related to safety and security requirements, and lists relevant research topics. The sender encourages recipients to share the opportunity with interested colleagues.
evidence_sentences: TU Braunschweig in Germany is recruiting an Associate Professor (tenured, W2)
We are seeking a candidate with a promising track record in the area of system design and analysis for safety and security requirements.
The following research topics are particularly relevant.
If you have questions, do not hesitate to ask me.
If you have colleagues who may be interested, please distribute the offer.
